Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its advanced features and exceptional quality, it's truly a game-changer in its category. I believe it could significantly enhance your daily experience. For this unique opportunity, I'm offering it to you at an exclusive price of $150. This is a limited-time offer, so please let me know if you're interested in securing this item. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
